title: Blaupunkt BTW09 Hybrid ANC Moksha Earbuds with 35dB (New Launch)
description: Features & Details Peace reaches new levels with the Blaupunkt BTW09 Moksha earbuds.They have the best technology. Deliver perfect sound. And take comfort to the highest level. That is what you would expect from a true German.Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation: It combines both feedforward and feedback microphones and processing to cover all the bases upto -35dB.Blink Pair Technology: The BTW09 is an open and shut case. You open the case and the buds are instantly connected to your device. It is as simple as that. The process requires no other step. This is fast and convenient!BTW09 come with 6 MICs, 3 in each bud. Each MIC has a specific purpose. One is the Voice MIC that moves your voice. Then there is the Feed Forward MIC that picks up any external noise. And then there is the Feed Back MIC. Together these 6 MICs give the ANC tech all the info it needs to ensure you get the cleanest sound.Play time: Up to 8 hours of play time with each charge and an additional 60 hours with the included charging case and almost a week of Standby time with Charging case. You will stop before these earbuds do. They can play music for more than 2 full days. Top them up and then forget about charging them. FreedomIt comes with 3 sound modes. Normal Mode is for music. ANC mode is for when you are in a very noisy place. And Ambient mode is for when you want some external sounds to filter throughWireless Charging with TurboVolt Fast Charging: The charging case can be charged wirelessly also by using a wireless charger or with a Type C USB cable. It supports fast charging, just charge 15 minutes and enjoy 4.5 hours of playtime.Comfort is in the design. BTW09 buds are small and fit perfectly. There is no long stalk that protrudes and the compact shape will make you wonder why brands still stay with the cumbersome long staked look.

title: Mivi DuoPods A550 TWS Earbuds with Quad Mic ENC, 13mm Powerful Bass, 50+ Hours of Playtime
description: Mivi DuoPods A550 TWS Earbuds with Quad Mic ENC(Environmental Noise Cancellation), 13mm Powerful Bass, 50+ Hours of Playtime, High Audio Quality, Metallic Design, Made in India, Bluetooth 5.1 (Green)N/Deal Price: ₹999Effective Price: ₹899 (With below offers)Get 15% back Up to ₹100. Applicable only when you pay using Amazon Pay UPIGet 15% back Up to ₹100. Applicable only when you pay using Amazon Pay ICICI credit cardAbout this itemEnvironmental Noise Cancellation: True Wireless Earbuds Mivi Duopods A550 reduce 90% environmental noise rather than escaping from the world for clear calls.50+ Hours of Battery Life: These TWS earbuds come with a 500mAh battery so that on the go, you can listen to your favourite tracks for more than two days with 50+ hours of combined playback time.Powerful Bass: The Mivi DuoPods A550 earbuds have custom-tuned EQ which provides you with a rich, deep, and powerful bass that won't miss a beat.Pure Authentic Sound: The Mivi A550 pods have 13mm electro-dynamic bass drivers provide studio-quality audio performance for the pure authentic sound you want.Crystal Clear Calls: These Bluetooth earphones are embedded with two very powerful MEMS mics into each of the earbuds so you can now be heard loud and clear.Low Latency: True wireless earbuds Mivi DuoPods A550 feature very low latency and they sync very well with the visuals, enabling boosted gaming experience.Elegant Metallic Design: Designed in a minimalist sleek style from premium metallic materials, these Wireless earbuds stay comfortable all day long.
